Specimen Type: Tissue samples (placental tissue, umbilical cord, fetal tissue, or other relevant specimens)
Purpose: To identify chromosomal copy number variations and related genomic abnormalities in tissues from autopsy, products of conception, or stillbirth.
Container: Sterile, properly labeled sample tube/container kept at 2–8 °C
Equipment: Microarray scanner, centrifuge, thermal cycler, pipettes, vortex mixer
